Contact the MyNCR administrator within your organization to get set up a with a Seismic login ID or to reset your password.
4 Tips to Promote Pay at Table to Customers
The current shift in consumer concerns about restaurant hygiene makes it especially important for operators to ensure consumers know about the safety precautions they are employing to build trust, fill tables, and keep guests coming back. Pay at the table makes it easier for everyone to stick to social distancing and hygiene rules. We have compiled some helpful tips for how to promote Pay at Table to customers <[[https://www.ncr.com/blogs/restaurants/how-to-communicate-pay-at-table-options-to-your-customers]]>. Contactless Dine-In Features Now Available Through our contactless payments solutions, NCR helped customers drive over $10 million in revenue in July. Now, we’re ready to take things a step further. Our newest Aloha Online Ordering features enable restaurants to create a completely contactless dining experience. Guests can view the menu, order and pay on their personal device without ever touching a menu, bill folio, or payment device. To support your sales efforts, we have a plethora of marketing materials and resources available on Seismic <[[https://auth.seismic.com/tenants/ncr/account/login?returnUrl=%2Ftenants%2Fncr%2Fconnect%2Fauthorize%2Fcallback%3Fclient_id%3D0188a34d-cdbd-4208-8ebc-d0567984915e%26response_type%3Did_token%2520token%26scope%3Dopenid%2520id%2520library%2520download%2520reporting%2520engagement_read%2520engagement_write%2520upload%26state%3D1b9a7ff0b4a40448d98f351777d9b19e%26redirect_uri%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fncr.seismic.com%252Fx5%252Fdoccenter.aspx%253FContentId%253Dfc29f6ec-aa0a-4b5c-bb1e-a26d2e90fc02%26response_mode%3Dform_post%26nonce%3D3e5e79f56fa20e3b624a7bdd29dcb9f1]]>.
